mapper.select: SELECT CC.NO CLASS_COMM_NO ,CCA.NAME CATE_NO ,M.NAME WRITER ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ANSWER_YN ,CC.REPORT_YN REPORT_YN ,HIT ,CC.ENROLL_DATE ENROLL_DATE FROM CLASS_COMM CC JOIN COMM_CATE CCA ON CC.CATE_NO = CCA.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON CC.WRITER = M.NO WHERE CC.CATE_NO = 1

SELECT CC.NO CLASS_COMM_NO , CCA.NAME CATE_NO , M.NO WRITER_NO ,M.NAME WRITER ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ANSWER_YN ,CC.REPORT_YN REPORT_YN ,HIT ,CC.ENROLL_DATE ENROLL_DATE FROM CLASS_COMM CC JOIN COMM_CATE CCA ON CC.CATE_NO = CCA.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON CC.WRITER = M.NO WHERE CC.NO = ${classCommNo}
